Table 2: Ablation study on Human3.6M dataset under Pro-
tocol #1 and #2. Best in bold.

Table 3: Quantitative evaluation using MPJPE in millimeter between estimated pose and the ground-truth on Human3.6M 
under Protocol #1, no rigid alignment or transform applied in post-processing. Best in bold, second best underlined. * indicates 
ground-truth 2D labels are used.

Table 4: Quantitative evaluation using P-MPJPE in millimeter between estimated pose and the ground-truth on Human3.6M 
under Protocol #2. Procrustes alignment to the ground-truth is used in post-processing. Best in bold, second best underlined. * 
indicates ground-truth 2D labels are used.

Table 5: Evaluation on Human3.6M dataset on human dynamics protocol. Mean angle error of predicted 3D poses after different 
time intervals is used following

Table 6: Evaluation on HumanEva-I dataset under Protocol 
#2. Legend: (*) uses extra depth annotations for ordinal su-
pervision. Best in bold, second best underlined.
